--- title: "Repeated measures and multivariate ANOVA" --- ## Content - Analysis of within-subject designs - Repeated measures and test of sphericity - Multivariate analysis of variance ## Learning objectives At the end of the session, students should be capable of - adequately modelling repeated measures - correctly interpreting tests of sphericity using software - explaining the benefits and disadvantages of repeated-measure designs - testing model assumptions in multivariate model ## Readings - {{< fa book >}} [Chapter 9](https://lbelzile.github.io/math80667a/repeated-measures-and-multivariate-models.html) of the course notes ## Complementary readings - [Chapter 5.2 ](https://opentext.wsu.edu/carriecuttler/chapter/experimental-design/) of @Price:2017 - Chapter 16 to 18 of @Keppel/Wickens:2004 ## Slides

View all slides in new window Download PDF of all slides
